respStmt.resp: This is a section of What Works in Conservation 2021 (DOI: 10.11647/obp.0267) edited by
respStmt.name: William J. Sutherland
Lynn V. Dicks
Silviu O. Petrovan
Rebecca K. Smith

availability.p: This licence applies to the content that follows, unless otherwise stated. The inclusion of quoted passages falls under fair dealing. Images and embedded objects may not be covered by this licence, in which case their copyright status is specified in text.

sourceDesc.p: This is original content, published in Open Access.

What Works in Conservation Series | ISSN: 2059-4232 (Print); 2059-4240 (Online)
